head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Bronx: Two Shot, One Fatally

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Bronx: Two Shot, One Fatally

body.head.byline: By JENNIFER 8. LEE; Compiled by John Sullivan

block.p: Two men were shot, one fatally, in the Olinville section of the Bronx shortly before 10 p.m. yesterday, the police said. One man was dead at the scene, in front of an apartment building at 3553 Holland Avenue, near 212th Street, from a gunshot to the head. The other man, who was shot multiple times in the torso, was taken to Jacobi Medical Center in critical condition. A man believed to have fired the shots fled in a gray vehicle, the police said.
